bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Cumberland County was formed in 1749 from Goochland County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Cumberland County Bill of Sale, 1822 Dec. Documents the sale of a negro man named George from the legatees of John Deshazer to Thomas Johnston for four hundred and five dollars.
